title: Fiido L3 e-bike review: Comfortable city commuting for a week on a single charge
description: The small size of the Fiido L3 Long Range Electric Bike may cause you to look away, but if you want something fun that'll propel you quickly to work and back and can go a week without charging, you should consider this just-under-$1,000 folding e-bike.

title: Linux dodges serious Wi-Fi security exploits
